description:
The apartment is bright, clean and simple in an excellent location on the east side of Soho, bordering Chinatown, Nolita and Little Italy. It's close to many great downtown destinations including: La Esquina, Balthazar, Mission Chinese, The New Museum, etc. You’ll love it because of the great neighborhood, great light and the simplicity of the apartment! It's great for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

No need to waste money on bogus frills. The has apartment is all you need for a great stay in downtown manhattan, clean, simple, chill. Super easy. Great location.

24/7 Access. Private Apartment!

Here to help and answer any questions!

Awesome neighborhood! The apartment is perfectly located on the east side of SOHO directly bordering Chinatown / Nolita / Little Italy. This particular area is a really great, special cultural mix. This neighborhood still has real New York soul and flavor - unlike other parts of Manhattan that have become more like a shopping mall! Enjoy authentic New York! :)

The apartment is conveniently located near many subway stations!  
B, D, F, M, 6, N, R, Q, J, Z

This apartment is a walk up: free exercise, the new york way!!
name: Perfectly Located Apartment in Downtown Manhattan
review:
El departamento está muy bien ubicado,  cerca de varias estaciones de metro, comercio, cerca de little Italia y el barrio chino,  cosa que se agradece si se quiere comer no tan caro.
Es un dpto pequeño bien remodelado y limpio, en un edificio antiguo,  está en el piso 5 y hay que subir a pie.
Tiene las cosas básicas para huéspedes,  normalmente nadie vive ahí,  así que lleven secador de pelo,  jabón.. etc.
